official_title: A bill to amend title 35, United States Code, with respect to assertions of invalidity of a patent by a licensee of that patent.

summary.text: Amends the patent laws to state that a patent licensee cannot be estopped from asserting the invalidity of the patent in a judicial proceeding. Insures the right of the licensor to receive royalty payments during the time such licensor's patent is under challenge, or to terminate the license at will.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 35, United States Code, with respect to assertions of invalidity of a patent by a licensee of that patent.
